summary: After being snubbed by the royal family, a malevolent fairy places a curse on a princess which only a prince can break, along with the help of three good fairies.
cast: Mary Costa|Bill Shirley|Eleanor Audley|Verna Felton|Barbara Luddy|Barbara Jo Allen|Taylor Holmes|Bill Thompson|Bob Amsberry|Candy Candido|Pinto Colvig|Hans Conried|James MacDonald|Dal McKennon|Marvin Miller
director: Directors: Clyde Geronimi, Les Clark (uncredited) | 2 more credits Â»
title: La bella durmiente
